name: Terra Adventure: Idle Clicker
description:
When humans explored everything possible within the Solar System and its immediate vicinity, they began looking for ways to cross new, enormous distances and see with their own eyes the beauty of the surrounding world. This became possible with the invention of the warp drive! Humans could now travel deeper and deeper into space, getting new knowledge about it. However, their thirst for discovery didn’t fade away. And they began to transform exoplanets outside the Solar System by terraforming them. Thus, they were creating new, habitable worlds fused with the most advanced technologies that were invented over the history of humankind.

In this game, you will be playing one of the Terraformers tasked by the Human Alliance to terraform exoplanets and make them habitable. Become a new hero at the helm of this complex and fascinating process —changing whole worlds is not so simple as it might seem at first sight. It will be your mission to explore and build a boundless universe of the future, demonstrating your best leadership qualities.

More than 20 planets are waiting to be changed into something completely new and previously unseen. To terraform them, you will have five industries and dozens of mechanisms, devices, technologies and enhancements at your disposal.

Stunning visuals will create a complete immersion into an unforgettable atmosphere of exploration and discovery while you’ll be terraforming and creating new worlds!
